title: What is the shrub height permitted for driveway and parking lot entrances so the view is not obstructed. Please also advise if this is an city, county, or state ordinance along with the contact name/phone or email address to report a violation. Thank you
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2015/06/when-trees-or-bushes-obstruct-traffic-views-or-the-right-of-way-whom-can-i-call-to-report-it/
